caption:
SIBO 101: What You Need to Know! 💡
Bloating, diarrhea, constipation… could it be SIBO? 🤔

Let’s break it down:
⚡ What is SIBO? Too much bacteria where it shouldn’t be - your small intestine.
🚨 Symptoms? Bloating, gas, bathroom troubles, and that “why does my stomach hate me?” feeling.
🩺 How do you test? The Trio-Smart breath test - the only one that measures all three gases.
✅ What next? Get tested, get answers, and start feeling better!

#SIBO101 #GutHealth #TestDontGuess #GemelliBiotech #TrioSmart
